title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. V, subch. J, pt. 197 - Home Inspectors
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. V, subch. J, pt. 197 - Home Inspectors

State Regulations

Subpart 197-1 - Business Practices And Standards (§ 197-1.1)

Subpart 197-2 - Home Inspection Qualifying Courses (§ 197-2.1 to 197-2.15)

Subpart 197-3 - Home Inspection Continuing Education Courses (§ 197-3.1 to 197-3.18)

Subpart 197-4 - Code Of Ethics And Regulations For Home Inspectors (§ 197-4.1 to 197-4.9)

Subpart 197-5 - Standards Of Practice For Home Inspectors (§ 197-5.1 to 197-5.16)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 19, ch. V, subch. J, pt. 197

Statutory authority: Real Property Law, §§444-f, 444-k, 444-l

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
